description: Non-material amendment to planning permission PP/13/03508 (rear extension, rebuild of rear garden party wall, excavation for basement & sub-basement, additional rear mechanical plant) for Internal alterations to floor to ceiling heights at lower ground and -2 basement levels involving lowering of floor slab of lower ground floor level by additional 150mm, and internal layout changes. External alterations, including reduction in garden level by 150mm, changes to internal staircase and external steps accordingly; change lower ground floor rear french doors to aluminium sliding doors; basement rear doors to be aluminium; rear doors of basement lightwell changed to fixed aluminium window; addition of slot window to rear elevation adjacent to sliding doors; removal of ledge and associated m&e equipment from western side of rear external space, extend void above basement lightwell; addition of two rooflights to upper ground floor terrace. Alterations to garden railing to balustrade. Windows repositioned on rear and side elevations at first and second floor levels, raising first floor staircase window by 280mm, second floor window to staircase centred on window below; second floor window to bedroom centred on window below and widened by 270mm, side elevation window moved northwards by 1500mm.
